The volume is laughably low ‚Äì even at max, it sounds like 3 bars out of 10. There‚Äôs a constant irritating airflow/humming noise that overpowers the actual audio. Music? Forget it. To make things worse, there‚Äôs no return option ‚Äì clearly the seller knows no one would keep this junk after using it once.This product is a pure scam, a waste of money, and honestly, it shouldn‚Äôt even be allowed to be sold online. If you‚Äôre reading this, do yourself a favor ‚ÄìRUN AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT WITHOUT ANY SECOND THOUGHT. You will not just regret buying it, you‚Äôll be angry that you ever trusted it.

First of all, these ear buds does not have Cover so this is first shock when you receive the product. That means not easy to carry and you have fear of losing buds (though magnet is powerful but little hard push and this may come out). Taking out Buds from the case is a task, and one may feel victory when actually comes out successfully, it is not user friendly. JBL needs to think on this. Fitness of Buds in ear is not so great but not so poor as well. Sound quality of music is an average quality and not at JBL's standard (i am using JBL Tune 510 BT & JBL Cinema SB190 as well). This product is of not that standard in terms of quality. Touch sensors and controls are wokring perfect. Battery perfromance is ok. Call Quality is ok for regular use with 4 mics this works, ANC needs to be more powerful. Pairing more than 1 device is challengin some time and its take time to connect to more than one device.
Nice product value for money spent

*JBL Wave Buds 2 ‚Äì Very Disappointing Product**1. It doesn't come with a protective cap.2. Not suitable for making calls.3. It is overpriced, and the call quality is very poor.4. I'll list down the pros and cons, but before that here's a story that will explain why I had yo buy these earbuds.In December of 2020 I first bought JBL C115. DEFINITELY THE BEST CHOICE OF HEADPHONES UNDER BUDGET. it lasted 4 years and a little more until 2025, 25th of April I had it in my trouser pockets and unknowingly spun it in the washing machine which damaged the hardware because it lacks water resistance.Therefore, I had to buy JBL WAVE BUDS 2. Tbh the build isn't as good as C115, JBL C115 had a perfect snug fit, it would completely get into my ear and the silicone tip was actually of good quality, maybe the sound and bass isn't as good as WAVE BUDS 2.overall WAVE BUDS 2 takes the trophy when it comes to the sound quality but its performance is EMBARRASSING in ANC, this is pure nonsense, JBL C115 didn't have any ANC yet the snug fit filtered all sounds. But this ANC nonsense in WAVE BUDS 2 is JUST PATHETIC!In Conclusion:Good sound quality, zero compromise in bass.Bad fitting and build.I hope that justifies the 3 stars.

After 3 week proper use. ..Design good,sound quality good for media  audio purposes nice bass crisp sound quality.But one drawback is the connection quality when u shift from song to calling ,there is always a glitch on sound quality while on call.So if u buying this to listen songs or media purpose its best value for money.
Awesome sound quality !!Only problem is removing headsets from the case and the case is also open, which makes security of headsets an issue

I've been using Oneplus Z2 ANC and JBL Tune 310 UsbC earphones for past year. I'd say Wave Buds 2 is better than Z2, but worse than Tune 310. Still has clarity expected from JBL, but sounds lack "flavour", vocals included. Good enough for audiobooks, podcasts or youtube, but  songs seem lacking.Buds are comfortable, though. Doesn't sit too deep in ear, and still stays on during walking. Practically forgot these were there. Having no stem helps, doesn't get accidentally knocked out.ANC makes almost no difference from passive noise isolation by in-ear buds. Talkthru mode is brilliant in amplifying voices over just ambient transparent mode.Mic isn't great, but that's just neckband earphones vs TWS problem. Battery life including case is definitely more than 24 hrs, just the buds is definitely more than 6 hrs.JBL app makes a lot of difference in customising the earphones. Can keep multiple user custom equaliser settings, audio balance etc.No lid on case, but magnets are strong. Not strong enough to hold on if case falls, though. Dropped case from abt 5ft on bed, 1 bud popped out. Might be better to buy a silicon cover with lid for this.
Audio is vera low ,can be used only if you are in idle state ,please don't go for it

This is surely a poorly designed JBL product. There is no lid for the earpod. The magnet appears strong, but the earpod keeps detaching from the case. Also, the earpod performance is just okay.I ordered two pieces and got them delivered two days back. As I found there is no lid for the case I called up the helpline on the same day of delivery. The first person assured me return pick up in four days. As there was no update on the app about the return pick up, I called up again. This time the Amazon response was nothing can be done as the picture showed no lid for the earpod case.My advise, consider something else. I am also thinking of moving out of Amazon.
Look way uglier in real life photos are definitely enhanced. Also way too big and not fit for girls. Bought them for my sister but won‚Äôt fit in her ears so i am stuck with pink headphones nowüòÉ
Poor sound quality, poor fitting into the ears (at least for me), low battery backup, and the worst for taking calls. Not at all recommended at any price point.

Totally love the feel of the product, the performance, happy on those fronts with my purchase. BUT, really very concerned about there being no cover to shut the case!When the ear pieces are inside, I'm afraid they may fall out of my pocket after dislodging from their place (despite the magnet, the fear is there). When the ear pieces are in use, then I'm constantly worrying about how much dust may gather inside the case!What did JBL achieve by eliminating the cover?!? It makes zero sense, if they are trying to improve ergonomics, zero sense for the customer's peace of mind!I was in 2 minds for asking for a full refund because there's no clear mention of this, I simply thought the graphics are modified to show only what's important. Silly of me, thus I didn't ask for the refund, but for future reference I hope everyone reads this.A GREAT listening device, in a really silly design!

The best thing is that the build quality. As u know jbl has its own quality. People looking for anc please dont go for it. I took this only because i needed a buds design. People with a wide ear might prefer the stick version which is jbl beam. The best thing is the auto connect option with android and ios. Bettery life is almost 8hrs in one strech and other 24 hrs with case. I could go easily 6 to 7 hrs while playing games. Video mode and putting the equalizer in vocal makes everghhing perfect. Its an value for money product. People looking for ease of use could get this. Appearance looks classy in black.battery life is great in this product. Get this Ease.
